After a catastrophic breach in the security of eentestfaciliteit, only a handful of survivors remain with their small arsenal of weapons. the catastrophe
has led to a viral outbreak causing hundreds of people slain or mutated. Led by military
Max Gatling (Dolph Lundgren), the survivors learned to fight with the infected, in the hope that salvation is near.
What they did not expect the emergence of another deadly threat ...
